Text: As ye sow, so shall ye reap.
GERMANS!…”Rise like lions after slumber, in unvanquishable number. Throw off your chains to the earth like dew, for you are many and they are few”

Their fault for supporting an evil nation.

And to compare this with Auschwitz  is just dumb and insulting. Germany got off easy considering all evil they did.

Som man bäddar, får man ligga.

I gues the Americans are getting what's coming to them for: the genocide of the Native Americans, including the use of biological warfare - Smallpox; slavery; exploitation of Chinese immigrants; their Japanese concentration camps; dropping nuclear bombs on Japan; Vietnam; Central and South America; Africa; their support of Apartheid in South Africa; their support of Apartheid in Israel; their support of countless dictators; their domination of the Middle East to control oil...

I guess ALL Americans "deserve" what they get for supporting the likes of Washington, Jeferson, Bush...

Read the book, 'Other Losses'. It shows how Eisenhower and the American Army starved and murdered over 1 million Germans after WW2. What they are doing in Iraq is like a fairy tale by comparison. 

And what kind of animals rape and murder little children like the American soldiers do? The Nazis were saints by comparison.
Also what the Israeli jews have and are still doing to the Native Arabs is also Genocide.
